application

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Game class responsible for organising the flow of the game. this class directs flow throughout the running of the program.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Steve Haines

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Integer boolToInt(java.lang.Boolean b)
      boolToInt helper method: take a bool and turn it into an int 0=false, 1=true called by the saveGame method to make data in file easier to access when loading.
      int coordinateToIndex(java.lang.Integer x, java.lang.Integer y)
      coordinateToIndex helper method: take a pair of coordinates and turn it into an index.
      void fireShot(int i, boolean isPlayer)
      fireShot fires a shot on the grid, triggered by a mouse click event in the grid class.
      void loadGame(java.io.File file)
      loadGame load a game from a file, this is called from the loadGamePress() method in the MainSceneController
      void newGame()
      newGame starts a new game by clearing screen and randomly filling both grids with ships.
      void placeFleet(int i, boolean isPlayer)
      placeFleet responsible for arranging the ship placement and passing in params to flow down the program.
      void populateFleet()
      populateFleet populates an instance of fleet with all of the ships.
      int randBetween(int min, int max)
      RandBetween generates a random integer between the passed in min and max integers
      boolean randBool()
      RandBool generates a random boolean
      void saveGame(java.io.File file)
      saveGame takes the results of the game and writes them into a file for loading later on.

      • newGame

        public void newGame()
        newGame starts a new game by clearing screen and randomly filling both grids with ships. iterates through the fleet placing until fleet array is consumed.
        Parameters:
        none -
